text: You can setup Zenodo to make a release from a GitHub tag automatically

elements.text: You can setup Zenodo to make a release from a GitHub tag automatically

text: You can even set the metadata using a `zenodo.json`, they just refuse to puslish the tagged version when the json has a parse error.

elements.text: You can even set the metadata using a `zenodo.json`, they just refuse to puslish the tagged version when the json has a parse error.
